body.header: What should I do to maximize my chances of success on the day?

section.p: 1. Get a good night's rest the night before.

ol.li: Arrive at the exam centre in good time.
Forget about the recording. It is not there to test you, but to ensure that you are getting a standardized test the same level of test as all the other IELTS candidates all over the world.
Be positive about yourself, and your life.
